member.name: ID2D1CommandSink2.DrawGdiMetafile
member.summary: Draws a metafile to the command sink using the given source and destination rectangles.
member.param: The rectangle in the target where the metafile will be drawn, relative to the upper left corner (defined in DIPs). If NULL is specified, the destination rectangle is the size of the target.
The rectangle of the source metafile that will be drawn, relative to the upper left corner (defined in DIPs). If NULL is specified, the source rectangle is the value returned by .
member.returns: This method does not return a value.

member.name: ID2D1CommandSink2.DrawGradientMesh
member.summary: Renders a given gradient mesh to the target.
member.param: The gradient mesh to be rendered.
member.returns: This method does not return a value.

member.name: ID2D1CommandSink2.DrawInk
member.summary: Renders the given ink object using the given brush and ink style.
member.param: The ink object to be rendered.
The brush with which to render the ink object.
The ink style to use when rendering the ink object.
member.returns: This method does not return a value.

member.name: ID2D1CommandSink2
member.summary: This interface performs all the same functions as the existing interface. It also enables access to ink rendering and gradient mesh rendering.
